room_title: Escape room "Christmas Cookie Caper" by Escape Hour Room in Chicago
review: We did the Christmas Cookie Caper room with our kids (3, 5, and 7). We all had a great time! It was challenging but enjoyable for all ages. The staff were very helpful with explaining the rules and objectives to the kids. We can't wait to go again!

room_title: Escape room "Christmas Cookie Caper" by Escape Hour Room in Chicago
review: So much fun! We did the family friendly Christmas Cookie Caper room and the kids had a blast! My 6 year old already wants to go back!
